content.text: The Operator Companion allows the operators, drivers, and users of your equipment to perform Inspections, using the Operator Companion web app. The web app is available to be used by all licensed Operators.
The home screen contains a list of the following:  Recently used assets. Recently completed inspections.

Required tasks will be highlighted with a special indicator.

content.title: Access the Operator Companion Web App

content.text: You can access the Operator Companion web app on a tablet or smartphone.
1. Open your device's browser and we recommend using either Safari, Firefox, or Chrome.
2. In the browser, enter your company's URL in the format <mycompanysname>.managerpluscloud.com/oc/ For example: https://abcompany.managerpluscloud.com/oc/
The Operator Companion login screen displays.
